snippet: Hero of Order, a 109-1 shot, won the $1 million Louisiana Derby at the Fair Grounds in New Orleans by a half-length over the favorite, Mark Valeski.
abstract: Long-shot racehorse Hero of Order wins Louisiana Derby at the Fair Grounds in New Orleans.
lead_paragraph: Hero of Order, a 109-1 shot, won the $1 million Louisiana Derby at the Fair Grounds in New Orleans by a half-length over the favorite, Mark Valeski.
